body_html:
In my C++ project,'s main.cpp, I just add the following line:

extern"C"{
#include <dlfcn.h>
}
void* dp = dlopen("/usr/local/lib/libcaffe2_yolo_ops_gpu.so",RTLD_LAZY);

then the operator defined in the libcaffe2_yolo_ops_gpu.so is linked succed to the caffe2's main lib libcaffe2.so and libcaffe2_gpu.so, so this problem is solved by myself ,and close this issue.
